## Rules

[[grid]]
| [[grid-column | 1 - 4 ]]
| | **Purpose**
|
| [[grid-column | 5 - 13 ]]
| |  Wrapper that adds a container with the current theme's global background color. Can be used for visual reference in combination with `DemoThemeProviderWithToggle`.
